name: NoLights
description:
Light is your salvation ... light is your weapon. Study caves, look for lights, but most importantly - find a large torch - your hope to return home and be afraid of beings lurking in the dark.
Features:
- Dozens of levels generated randomly.
- HUD character (health, shells, fuel) right on the back.
- The simplest pixel graphics for a comfortable game, even on a coffee grinder.
- Specially selected 8-bit soundtrack.
- Cross-platform development.
